p: In the in-vivo antidiabetic study, we used Albino mice of either sex with an average weight of up to 30 gm. The animals were kept in an animal house as per the standard procedure of the animals' Bye-Laws and under the approval of Ethical Committee, Department of Pharmacy, Faculty of Biological Sciences, University of Malakand, Pakistan as per the animals Bye-Laws 2008 (Scientific Procedure Issue-I).
